vhsmp:heal.name: Heal
vhsmp:heal.description: Heals the player for 1 hp per companion level.

vhsmp:mana_restore.name: Mana Restore
vhsmp:mana_restore.description: Restores 10 mana for the player per companion level.

vhsmp:absorption_heart.name: Absorption Heart
vhsmp:absorption_heart.description: Gives one yellow heart per companion level to the player.

vhsmp:speed.name: Speed
vhsmp:speed.description: Increases movement speed for 2 seconds per companion level to the player.

vhsmp:rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
vhsmp:rejuvenation.description: Casts a rejuvenation totem where the player stands.

vhsmp:spirit.name: Spirit
vhsmp:spirit.description: Casts a spirit totem where the player stands.

vhsmp:wrath.name: Wrath
vhsmp:wrath.description: Casts a wrath totem where the player stands.

vhsmp:mana_barrier.name: Barrier
vhsmp:mana_barrier.description: Casts a mana barrier around the player, the duration is based on companion level.

vhsmp:ultimate_implode.name: The Vault Breaker
vhsmp:ultimate_implode.description: Removes all spawners in the room the player is in!
